text:
My children has been attending swimming lesson with Ace Dolphin since 2018 with the youngest joining their lesson in 2023.

The Coaches has their way to build water confidence and safety with the toddlers/ preschoolers, sustaining their interest to attend their class every week.  Special shout-out to Coach WeiJie for his patient, fun, gentle yet firm way of conducting his classes.

The Coaches are experienced, have a standardized method and focus on strokes and stamina, thus children have good progress and  completed their Silver/ Gold SwimSafer exams progressively.

My children love attending swimming class with Ace Dolphin and I recommend parents to try them out.

Glad that my kid is under the guidance and care of Coach Ivan.
Very patient, fun loving and caring Coach.
He has a way of connecting with the kids and this allows them to have plenty of fun while learning.
Plan to enrol my youngest gal next year and under his care too.
Thanks to Coach Hanrong for his patience in guiding my kids in building up water confidence in the deep pool as well as learning the different swim strokes. The kids enjoy their swim class :)

This swim school is highly recommended! Both my sons achieved Swim Safer Gold awards, with my younger son persevering for 7 years.  A huge thank you to all the coaches, past and present, for their dedication and hard work.  Special thanks to HanRong and Alvin for their unwavering support and encouragement, and to Nas and Raymond for their contributions in the past.  If you're looking for a swim school that fosters dedication and achievement, I highly recommend giving this one a try!

I have enrolled my kid 6 year old and the coach is Wei Jie at Yiu Chu Kang Swimming pool. The coach is very patience and at the beginning my kid she doesn’t know how to swim at all. After 8 lessons now she can swim very well without floaties and now she knows freestyle and breaststroke  … it’s amazing to see her improved so much !
